body_html:
FWIW, I had the same slow startup problem with the 'latest-gpu' docker image and a GFX1080.
Moving over to 'latest-devel-gpu', which is compiled with 6.1 architecture support, fixed it.
body_text:

body:
FWIW, I had the same slow startup problem with the 'latest-gpu' docker image and a GFX1080. 
Moving over to 'latest-devel-gpu', which is compiled with 6.1 architecture support, fixed it.
